about_the_game:
BEDTIME STORIES 1


This VISUAL NOVEL continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. This complex story includes also the life of Stephanie, Michelle, Monica, etc.

There are decisions and different paths to take, as well as the outfits options. Choose different outfits where possible.
Sound effects have been added: door open, door close, air conditioning, slap, spank. ambient music or ambient sounds, etc.
******** A splendor in 4k = 3840 x 2160 with options to choose between normal or artistic images (sometimes available)

The visual novel has the following episodes:
EP01 - The Party (Cindy and Michelle)
EP02 - Lovebirds (Katie and Josh)
EP03 - Fun Time (Katie and Josh & Cindy, Michelle and Addison)

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains scenes with sex and explicit genitals are visible. Genitals might appear in some renders as well. Drugs and alcohol are no main topic but can appear in story relevant quests and dialogues. Self-harm is not included.
The erotic scenes contain:
- lesbian poses, girl-on-girl with full nudity
- Female and male sex scene (rough missionary, from behind, side sex, male ejaculation, blow job, throat grabbing, standing)
- teaser with yoga girls
- kissing and licking, rubbing, face sitting

BEDTIME STORIES 1


This VISUAL NOVEL continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. This complex story includes also the life of Stephanie, Michelle, Monica, etc.

There are decisions and different paths to take, as well as the outfits options. Choose different outfits where possible.
Sound effects have been added: door open, door close, air conditioning, slap, spank. ambient music or ambient sounds, etc.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: any Linux version
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit only due to renpy software

  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit only due to renpy software
